Name: Rocket Boots Mania
About the game: FIRE UP THE ROCKET BOOTS Clear your mind and enter the state of Rocket-Zen. Flow through the levels like rocket fuel. Run, jump, bunny-hop, boost, power-slide, wallrun, throw, grab, climb, push, pull, flip and even fly to experience unprecendented level of freedom. May the fire be with you, always. EXPLORE THE ROCKET WORLD Collect Tokens, solve puzzles, find secrets and unlock hidden areas in 4 big vibrant HUBs. Dash through the tropical Rocket Island, defy gravity in Sky Mountains, carve your own path with throwable hatchets in Deep Forest and beat the impossible maze in the Deadly Arenas. EMBRACE THE ROCKET-SWAG Thanks to our beloved Discord community of Content Creators you have an insane number of skins to choose from! Are you feeling creative? Want to help us create more skins? Stop by our Discord and we will teach you how! It's very easy. KEY FEATURES A thrilling open world full of interactions, puzzles, collectibles, secrets and unique gameplay Carefully designed gameplay as the beating heart of the game High replayability value – explore every corner, find every secret, improve your score / time A fine example of an “easy to learn, hard to master” game Induces a strong “just one more round” syndrome A never-ending “tug of war” between friends within an awesome online community Complete freedom of movement and gameplay style choice Official leaderboards GAME STATE NOW 99.9% stable, bug-free experience Rocket Island HUB done and live on Steam 30+ final quality levels done and live on Steam Deep Forest HUB 90% done and being tested in closed beta Sky Mountains HUB 90% done and being tested in closed beta Deadly Arenas HUB 90% done and being tested in closed beta 30+ levels done and being tested in closed beta WILL BE ADDED DURING EARLY ACCESS Level Editor Rewards and badges Deeper character customization Achievements TAGS #playRBM
